overview.en: STTC chain is an open ecology of self-drive sharing, and users actually generate great value through their own behaviors.STTC travel chain aims to build a decentralized global travel platform, which gathers all the content including eating, drinking and playing. Through STTC travel chain technology, users'

and various effective behavior data will be transformed into digital assets that real users can control.These digital assets are owned and controlled by users.These digital assets can be realized and circulated in the market through the form of STTC token through the STTC chain link platform.This model will subvert the traditional mobile Internet model. Users are no longer the data producers who have no right to pay in silence.It is a win-win partnership with the Internet platform.
overview.zh: STTC优游链是一个自驱共享的开放生态，用户通过自身行为实际上产生巨大价值。STTC优游链旨在建设一个去中心化的全球旅游出行平台，它集聚了包括吃喝玩乐的所有内容，通过STTC优游链技术，用户的“征信身份证”，及各种有效行为数据将转化为真正的用户可以掌控的数字资产。这些数字资产是属于用户的，由用户来掌控。通过STTC优游链平台，这些数字资产通过STTC优游链代币（token）的形式可以在市场上实现变现，流通。这种模式将颠覆传统的移动互联网模式，用户再也不是毫无权利的，默默付出的数据生产者；而是和互联网平台一起共建，共赢的伙伴。
